member.name: IFolderViewHost.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the object that hosts an object.
member.param: The handle of the window that contains the object.
The address of a pointer to a data object.
The address of a pointer to a RECT structure that specifies the dimensions of the folder view.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFolderViewHost
member.summary: Exposes a method that hosts an object in a window.
